secText:
Lesson:
1. [OBJ:expsec_a356:Evaluate expressions using the order of operations] (PEMDAS).
2. [OBJ:expsec_5356:Evaluate expressions with negative numbers] using PEMDAS.
3. [OBJ:expsec_a358:Evaluate expressions with fraction bars].

In-class assessment:
1. [OBJ:qc_39175:Evaluate] an expression with negative numbers using PEMDAS.
2. [OBJ:qc_39180:Evaluate] an expression with a fraction bar using PEMDAS.
